items.summary: In frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx, inject a valid schema.org JobPosting JSON-LD structured data block directly in the component's JSX return as a <script type='application/ld+json'> tag using dangerouslySetInnerHTML. The JSON-LD must include at minimum: @context (https://schema.org), @type (JobPosting), title (Class A CDL Team Driver – OTR Refrigerated), hiringOrganization (Supreme Trucking / supremeltl.com), jobLocation (nationwide/United States), datePosted, baseSalary reflecting the CPM pay structure, and applicationContact with phone (201) 838-0000 ext. 1 and email recruiting@supremeltl.com. Do not modify any other component, page, backend logic, or styling — only add the <script> tag to CareersPage.tsx.
